Package appv2.core.view

package appv2.core.view

This package contains all necessary controller for the view.

Since:
2.0
Author:
mzoesch

    Class
    Description
    DiscardedPileController
    Controller for the Discarded Pile Screen.
    GameController
    Controller for the Game Screen.
    Handles the dynamic rendering of the Game Screen and the logic behind it.
    GameEndedController
    Controller for the Game Ended Screen.
    GameInitController
    Controller for the Game Init Screen.
    Handles the creation of new games and the addition of players to the game.
    GameScene
    Holds useful information about a rendered screen.
    MainMenuController
    Controller for the main menu screen.
    MasterController
    High-level manager object for the overall flow of screens in the Graphical User Interface.

    Controller for the Player Scores Screen.
